message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd love it! I'm offering it to you for $180.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $150.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is a bit low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $165?  I'm confident you'll be happy with this product!
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer, but I believe $165 is still a bit high for me. I would like to propose $155 as my counteroffer.
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here. Let's compromise at $160. This is a great deal for both of us!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. My counteroffer remains at $155.
Bob, I'm starting to think we might not be able to come to an agreement.  I'm going to drop my price one last time to $158.  If this doesn't work, I'm going to have to move on.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower your price. I would like to counteroffer at $157.
